We've been on here quite a bit, so I thought it'd post anotha offah'.

**About**

* Canadian VPS Company
* CoreOS / Atomic Host cloud-init
* Security oriented
* Located in Kitchener, Ontario
* KVM Virtualization
* 100% custom control panel with real-time updates
* 100% custom back-end 

**Technical**

 * Storage: RAID-5 HDD's && SSD-Cached storage
 * CPU: 2.0 to 2.5Ghz
 * Network: 10Gb back-end network

**Other**

 * [Terms of Service? What can I run?](https://kihihosting.com/tos)
 * IPv6? Not yet. Soon however, just waiting for our DC to catch-up
 * Transparency / Public Whois? Yup. [Public WhoIs](https://easywhois.com/)

**Low End Talk Offers**

KVM 512MB RAM - $4 / Month - [Order Here](https://kihihosting.com/vps)

* RAM: 512MB
* CPU: 1
* Storage: 40GB SSD-Cached
* Bandwidth: 500GB
* Network: 100Mbps, 1Gbps burstable
* IP: 1 IPv4
